ai-tha-ap207:0.3_0: The Elders presented flowers to fall,
ai-tha-ap207:2.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap207:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap207:3.1_0: twenty eons after the left of the world.
ai-tha-ap207:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nigrodha.
ai-tha-ap207:6.1_0: The fifth time the Elder Nun Bimbālaka was finished.
